suggestions.original: To improve the realism of the artwork, focus on refining the proportions of the figures. Study human anatomy to ensure that body parts are in correct relation to each other. Enhance the textures by adding more details to clothing, hair, and other elements. Use shading and lighting to create depth and dimension, making the figures and objects appear more three-dimensional. Pay attention to perspective to ensure that all elements are consistent with the viewpoint. Adding subtle gradients and shadows can also help in achieving a more realistic look.
